segments.text: The water from that sink is just everywhere now, it's quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s flowing over the edge in a continuous, unceasing sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see it streaming down the cabinet doors, slicking them wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is expanding, slowly engulfing more space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's kind of disgusting to think of all that water just wasting away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And it's making such a mess, soaking into everything it touches.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of stepping into that cold, possibly grimy water is unpleasant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much water has spilled without anyone intervening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a huge waste, both of water and of potential damage to the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the tidy garden outside the window is almost ironic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's becoming a miniature flood zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone will notice before the entire floor is soaked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s quite a spectacle of domestic negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer volume of water is really quite striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
